solution_line_template: Since there are {months_jan_jul} months from January to July, then Roe's savings for those months sum up to ${savings_per_month_jan_jul} x {months_jan_jul} = $<<{months_jan_jul}*{savings_per_month_jan_jul}={savings_jan_jul}>>{savings_jan_jul}.

Since there are {months_aug_nov} months from August to November, then her savings for those months sum up to ${savings_per_month_aug_nov} x {months_aug_nov} = $<<{months_aug_nov}*{savings_per_month_aug_nov}={savings_aug_nov}>>{savings_aug_nov}.
Her total savings from January to November is ${savings_jan_jul} + ${savings_aug_nov} = $<<{savings_jan_jul}+{savings_aug_nov}={savings_jan_nov}>>{savings_jan_nov}.
Therefore, she needs to save ${total_goal} - ${savings_jan_nov} = $<<{total_goal}-{savings_jan_nov}={savings_december}>>{savings_december} in December.
